link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric-2009-12-16.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/entity http://www.xbrl.org/2008/entity-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd

generic:link.label:label: Equity is required.
generic:link.msg:message: SATISFIED: (OK) The reported fact for Equity which is expected was found.
UNSATISFIED: (ERROR) The reported fact for Equity which is expected was *NOT FOUND*.

generic:link.label:label: Roll forward reconciles: Beginning equity + net income - dividends + common stock issued = Ending equity
generic:link.msg:message: SATISFIED: (OK) The roll forward of the concept {node-name($BalanceStart)} properly reconciles. The reported beginning balance of {$BalanceStart} whose context ID is '{$BalanceStart/@contextRef}' does reconcile to the ending balance of {$BalanceEnd} whose context ID is '{$BalanceEnd/@contextRef}'.

UNSATISFIED: (ERROR) The roll forward of the concept {node-name($BalanceStart)} does *NOT* reconcile. The reported beginning balance of {$BalanceStart} whose context ID is '{$BalanceStart/@contextRef}' does not reconcile to the ending balance of {$BalanceEnd} whose context ID is '{$BalanceEnd/@contextRef}'.

generic:link.label:label: Roll forward reconciles: Beginning equity + net income - dividends + common stock issued = Ending equity
generic:link.msg:message: SATISFIED: (OK) The roll forward of the concept {node-name($BalanceStart)} properly reconciles. The reported beginning balance of {$BalanceStart} whose context ID is '{$BalanceStart/@contextRef}' does reconcile to the ending balance of {$BalanceEnd} whose context ID is '{$BalanceEnd/@contextRef}'.

UNSATISFIED: (ERROR) The roll forward of the concept {node-name($BalanceStart)} does *NOT* reconcile. The reported beginning balance of {$BalanceStart} whose context ID is '{$BalanceStart/@contextRef}' does not reconcile to the ending balance of {$BalanceEnd} whose context ID is '{$BalanceEnd/@contextRef}'.

generic:link.msg:message: SATISFIED: (OK) The roll forward of the concept {node-name($BalanceStart)} properly reconciles. generic:link.msg:message: SATISFIED: (OK) The roll forward of the concept {node-name($BalanceStart)} properly reconciles. The reported beginning balance of {$BalanceStart} whose context ID is '{$BalanceStart/@contextRef}' does reconcile to the ending balance of {$BalanceEnd} whose context ID is '{$BalanceEnd/@contextRef}'.

generic:link.label:label: CommonStockIssued for each equity component foots to total.
generic:link.msg:message: SATISFIED: (OK) The reported total {$VARIABLE_Total} for the concept {node-name($VARIABLE_Total)} agrees to the aggregate of each reported member.

UNSATISFIED: (ERROR) The reported total {$VARIABLE_Total} for the concept {node-name($VARIABLE_Total)} does *NOT* agree to the sum of the reported members of {sum($VARIABLE_Each)}. There is a difference of {$VARIABLE_Total - sum($VARIABLE_Each)}.

generic:link.label:label: Dividends for each equity component foots to total.
generic:link.msg:message: SATISFIED: (OK) The reported total {$VARIABLE_Total} for the concept {node-name($VARIABLE_Total)} agrees to the aggregate of each reported member.

UNSATISFIED: (ERROR) The reported total {$VARIABLE_Total} for the concept {node-name($VARIABLE_Total)} does *NOT* agree to the sum of the reported members of {sum($VARIABLE_Each)}. There is a difference of {$VARIABLE_Total - sum($VARIABLE_Each)}.
